titleStmt.title: Coffee-house jests. Refined and enlarged. By the author of the Oxford jests. The fourth edition, with large additions. This may be re-printed, Feb. 25. 1685. R.P.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, William, fl. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Hen. Rhodes, next door to the Swan-Tavern, near Bride-Lane in Fleet street,

notesStmt.note: The author of "the Oxford jests" = William Hickes.
Frontis = ill. At head of frontis.: Coffee house jests; At foot: printed for Henry Rodes near Bride lane in Fleetstreet.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Hen. Rhodes, next door to the Swan-Tavern
